name: Save Christian
description:
[IMPORTANT TO READ]

Due to lack of time I could not finish it completely so some sections are empty, which are the controls and some animations for this, here I give you the explanation and the controls:

[Gameplay]

In this world, legend has it that Santa's real name is Christian and he has a pet rat.

[Level 1]

To overcome it, it is necessary to remove the cap from the chest, but be careful, you must do it quickly before the bomb explodes.

[Level 2]

Here you must survive for 2 minutes to the attacks of Mr. Banana to finally fall, but watch out as time progresses this will throw dynamite faster and the ice will break.

[Level 3]

This part is somewhat complicated, since Mr. Banana from the ground will be shooting arrows with dynamite at you, so you will have to dodge them or jump over the arrows to gain more momentum and crush Mr. Banana's head, this 3 times.

However each time you do it the speed of the arrows will increase.

[Controls]

-Left and right buttons are used to move horizontally

- "Z" Used to jump or to activate the bluetooth of the hat (it also works to deactivate the effect).

- "X" This works to jump over the arrows as long as it is in the air.

- "Enter" This is used to select in the menu and to skip dialogues.

- "Down" This is used to go down the stairs

[Credits]

I also could not finish this section in the game.

Graphics: All sprites and other graphics were designed by me at Aseprite

Programming: The game was programmed in godot completely from 0.

Sounds: All sound effects were created from a microphone and tweaked in audacity

Music: The 2 songs that are from the menu and the game in general were taken from this author: Purple Planet Music
